items.content_html: A powerful and lightweight text editor built using Vue.js and Quill.js, designed to deliver a seamless and customizable rich-text editing experience. This project provides an intuitive interface with support for formatting, embedding media, and extending features through custom modules. Perfect for blog platforms, CMS systems, or any application.
items.title: ahmetbulbul0/Text-Editor-VueJs: A powerful and lightweight text editor built using Vue.js and Quill.js, designed to deliver a seamless and customizable rich-text editing experience. This project provides an intuitive interface with support for formatting, embedding media, and extending features through custom modules. Perfect for blog platforms, CMS systems, or any application.

items.content_html: "ThemeLab is a lightweight, configurable theming library to help you manage and apply themes in your app. Developed for easy use in any frontend framework or libraries with direct focus on development ease in setting up a fully fledged configurable themes for your application."

items.content_html: This portfolio website is built using Once UI, a lightweight and versatile design system that simplifies the creation of consistent and customizable applications. It provides a robust token and style system, along with a library of reusable components, making it easy to build modern, responsive websites in Next.js
items.title: GKcodebase/portfolio2.0: This portfolio website is built using Once UI, a lightweight and versatile design system that simplifies the creation of consistent and customizable applications. It provides a robust token and style system, along with a library of reusable components, making it easy to build modern, responsive websites in Next.js

items.content_html: A lightweight CigalPay Crypto Card, CDN-hosted HTML, CSS, and JavaScript library designed for easy integration of cryptocurrency selection cards into payment interfaces. It allows users to choose from various cryptocurrencies in a visually appealing and user-friendly way

It allows users to choose from various cryptocurrencies in a visually appealing and user-friendly way
